channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 8 things coming to the British Airways experience, including new first class, lounges
item.description: British Airways has long been the largest European carrier serving the U.S., and now, the airline wants to make itself even more relevant to your trav...

item.title: Allegiant slashes 19 routes due to Boeing delivery delays
item.description: Ultra-low-cost carrier Allegiant Air is making some big changes to its route network. The Las Vegas-based airline quietly filed plans to cut 19 routes...

item.title: Current Choice Privileges promotions to earn bonus points and more

item.title: JetBlue to launch service from Islip’s Long Island MacArthur Airport
item.description: JetBlue is expanding to a new airport in New York – one that’s not far from its home base. Starting this fall, the carrier will launch service from Is...

item.title: Deal alert: Fly to Gothenburg, Sweden, from various US cities from $425 round-trip
item.description: We’ve shared a number of great airfare sales to Europe recently. Now, there’s one to Sweden — specifically the port city of Gothenburg — with round-tr...
